scripts.install-dependencies: npm run install-dependencies-front && npm run install-dependencies-back
scripts.start:front: npm run install-dependencies-front && cd frontend && npm start
scripts.start:back: npm run install-dependencies-back && cd backend && npm run start:dev
scripts.build: npm run install-dependencies && npm run build:back && npm run build:front
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-dependencies-back && npm run build:back
scripts.netlify-build: npm run install-dependencies-front && npm run build:front
scripts.build-storybook: npm run install-dependencies-front && npm run build:storybook
